name: Moe
description: Characters who are so cute in the moe sense.

name: Chaotic
description: Watch out! These characters are chaotic or hedonistic!

name: Practical
description: Got a question or problem? These characters are helpful or serious.

name: Futuristic
description: They live in the future, engage with cutting-edge technology, or embrace futuristic aesthetics.

name: Traditional
description: They live in the past, prefer traditional ways of life, or embrace old-fashioned aesthetics.

name: Has Chat
description: You have an active chat with these characters.

name: Not Chatted
description: You have no active chats with these characters.

name: Not Moe
description: Characters who are not cute in the moe sense.

name: Male
description: The boys are back in town!

name: Female
description: Girls just want to have fun!

name: All
description: Click on the random button to go to a random character. Anyone can be selected.
